content:
alexcrichton commented on Issue #2608:

Ah it's also worth mentioning that this commit fixes a bug where differences in native CPU flags weren't taken into account when deserializing blobs in Module::deserialize, just ISA-independent settings. That was fixed with the addition of a new trait method on TargetIsa
